When trauma enters into the reality of the analyst and of the analysand, when it attacks the setting, what becomes of the analyst's role?
Nevertheless, these youth have suffered maltreatment and interventions to improve their ability to cope with past trauma and their often uncertain present are clearly needed.
The extent to which SUD should be included in the trauma criterion is considered.
